amendatorysection.catchline: County treasurer; distribute school funds; when.
amendatorysection.para: Each county treasurer of a county with territory in a learning community shall distribute any funds collected by such county treasurer from the common general fund levy and the common building fund levy of such learning community to each member school district pursuant to sections 79-1073 and 79-1073.01 at least once each month.

Each county treasurer shall, upon request of a majority of the members of the school board or board of education in any school district, at least once each month distribute to the district any funds collected by such county treasurer for school purposes.
